summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to forfeited or unclaimed firearms; authorizing the acceptance of a gift from Stop the Violence, through the Seattle Neighborhood Group, to be used to pay part or all of the fee required by state law for destruction of forfeited or unclaimed firearms, establishing a Handgun Destruction subaccount for deposit of the gift, and authorizing the Chief of Police to determine which forfeited or unclaimed firearms shall be destroyed.
